greeting.text: Ah, a new courier! I'm Tam. I've been watching the letter board for days, hoping someone would take my letter to my sister in Millhaven. Would you be willing to help?

choices.text: I'd be happy to help. Tell me about your letter.
What's the payment for this delivery?
I'm sorry, I can't help right now.

explain_letter.text: Thank you so much! My sister moved to Millhaven last year for work. I haven't heard from her in months and I'm worried. This letter... it's important. Please make sure it reaches her safely.

choices.text: Don't worry, I'll make sure she gets it.

discuss_payment.text: I don't have much, but the letter board posting offers 5 coins. It's all I could scrape together. Please, it's very important that my sister receives this letter.

choices.text: Five coins is fair. I'll take your letter.

cannot_pay_more.text: I wish I could, but five coins is all I have. I've been saving for weeks just to afford that. Please understand, this letter means everything to me.

choices.text: I understand. I'll deliver it for five coins.

disappointed.text: Oh... I understand. If you change your mind, I'll be here. My sister... she needs to know I'm thinking of her.

grateful.text: Thank you! You don't know what this means to me. Safe travels, courier. May the roads be kind to you.
